snippet.title: Despicable Me: The Game Trailer
snippet.description: Trailer for Despicable Me for Wii, Nintendo DS, Playstation 2, and PSP from D3 Publisher. Based on Universal Pictures and Illumination Entertainment's inaugural 3-D CGI feature film, Despicable Me: The Game lets players of all ages experience the thrill of being downright despicable as they become Gru, one of the world's greatest super-villains and plan the biggest heist in history: stealing the moon! Visit http://www.nintendoworldreport.com/  for more information.
